selected_quotes: #obesity in kids is costly, now going forward
Childhood #obesity more expensive than a year of college, says DGHI faculty member Dr. Eric Finkelstein
New study: childhood obesity can add between $12,660-$19,630 in lifetime medical costs
Child #obesity is costly in the US.

citation.abstract: An estimate of the lifetime medical costs of an obese child provides a benchmark of the potential per capita savings that could accrue from successful childhood obesity prevention efforts. We reviewed the literature to identify the best current estimate of the incremental lifetime per capita medical cost of an obese child in the United States today relative to a normal weight child.
citation.title: Lifetime Direct Medical Costs of Childhood Obesity

news.title: Childhood Obesity Costs $19,000 Over A Lifetime When Compared To Expenses For Healthy Kids
